about_the_game:
The Game

Shadow Stalker is an asymmetrical multiplayer horror experience. One player takes on the role of “The Hunted,” a near-invisible monstrosity armed with supernatural abilities, while 2–8 other players team up as “The Hunters,” a well-equipped elite task force.

...Over here...

The Hunted thrives in the shadows, barely perceptible to the naked eye. Despite the number of Hunters outnumbering The Hunted, The Hunted’s unique powers can even the odds:
  • Wall Climbing – Scale walls, crawl along ceilings, and strike from impossible angles.
  • Raise the Dead – Reanimate defeated NPCs and players to create a shambling horde that slows your pursuers.
  • Telekinesis – Hurl heavy objects through the air to damage or disorient the Hunters.

Hunt or Be Hunted

Step into the boots of a Hunter—a member of an elite squad tasked with bringing down The Hunted. Work as a team, keep your eyes peeled, and use advanced tactics to corner your prey. Armed with high-tech weapons and gadgets, you’ll need to stay alert; or you might just find yourself on the receiving end of the hunt.
